text: For the following items, please reply from 0 (not at all like me)to 5 (very much like me)
1. I can usually talk my way out of anything.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 2. When people don’t notice me, I start to feel bad about myself.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 3. I often hide my needs for fear that others will see me as needy and desperate.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 4. I can make anyone believe anything I want them to.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 5. I get annoyed by people who are not interested in what I say or do.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 6. I find it easy to manipulate people.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 7. Sometimes I avoid people because I’m concerned that they’ll disappoint me.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 8. I typically get very angry when I’m unable to get what I want from others.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 9. When others don’t meet my expectations, I often feel ashamed about what I wanted.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 10. I feel important when others rely on me.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 11. I can read people like a book.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 12. Sacrificing for others makes me the better person.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 13. I often fantasize about accomplishing things that are probably beyond my means.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 14. Sometimes I avoid people because I’m afraid they won’t do what I want them to do.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 15. It’s hard to show others the weaknesses I feel inside.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 16. It’s hard to feel good about myself unless I know other people admire me.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 17. I often fantasize about being rewarded for my efforts.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 18. I am preoccupied with thoughts and concerns that most people are not interested in me.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 19. I like to have friends who rely on me because it makes me feel important.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 20. Sometimes I avoid people because I’m concerned they won’t acknowledge what I do for them.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 21. It’s hard for me to feel good about myself unless I know other people like me.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 22. It irritates me when people don’t notice how good a person I am.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 23. I will never be satisfied until I get all that I deserve.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 24. I try to show what a good person I am through my sacrifices.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 25. I often fantasize about performing heroic deeds.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 26. I often fantasize about being recognized for my accomplishments.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 27. I can’t stand relying on other people because it makes me feel weak.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me

text: 28. When others get a glimpse of my needs, I feel anxious and ashamed.
side_text: Not at all like me|Very much like me
